isis.stitle: CAB: 7000 AND 8000 SERIES MODELS - REMOVAL AND INSTALLATION - Headliner Trim Panel - Crew Cab

step1.para:
Remove header console panel. Refer to
HEADER CONSOLE PANEL
.

figure.caption: Figure 131. Headliner Trim Panel, Crew Cab, Front

item.para: Use the ZTSE4839 interior trim tool to remove all push-in interior fasteners.
Graphic shows passenger side; driver side procedures are the same.

step1.para: Remove one push-in fastener from above each door opening.
Remove two push-in fasteners from each B-pillar trim panel.
Remove five push-in fasteners from the back of the front headliner trim panel where both headliners join.
Remove one push-in fastener from front, center of the headliner trim panel. Support the front of the front headliner trim panel after removing push-in fastener.
Lower the front of the front headliner trim panel and slide forward.
Pull the front headliner trim panel out from underneath the rear headliner trim panel and the B-pillar trim panels.
Remove front headliner trim panel.
Slide back edge of front headliner trim panel in place over the top of the rear headliner trim panel and the B-pillar trim panels ( Figure 131, Items 2, 4, and 5).
Lift up the front, center of the front headliner trim panel and install one push-in fastener through trim panel and into cab header ( Figure 131, Items 1, 2, and 3).
Install five push-in fasteners into the back of the front headliner trim panel where both headliners join ( Figure 131, Items 2, 3, and 4).
Install two push-in fasteners into each B-pillar trim panel ( Figure 131, Items 3 and 5).
Install one push-in fastener above each door opening ( Figure 131, Item 3).

Install header console panel. Refer to
HEADER CONSOLE PANEL
.

figure.caption: Figure 132. Headliner Trim Panel, Crew Cab, Rear

calloutgroup.callout1: 4. CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

item.para: Use the ZTSE4839 interior trim tool to remove all push-in interior fasteners.
Graphic shows passenger side; driver side procedures are the same.

step1.para: Pull coat hook lever cover down.
Push coat hook lever down and remove coat hook.
Remove two push-in fasteners at the top of each corner and side interior trim panel.
Remove two push-in fasteners at the back of rear headliner trim panel.

figure.caption: Figure 133. Headliner Trim Panel, Crew Cab, Rear

step1.para: Remove two push-in fasteners from each B-pillar trim panel.
Remove seven push-in fasteners from the rear headliner trim panel as shown.
Slide front of rear headliner trim panel forward and carefully pull out from behind corner and side interior trim panels (not shown) and B-pillar trim panels.
Lower rear headliner trim panel down and disconnect electrical connector from courtesy light.
Remove rear headliner trim panel.
Connect electrical connector to courtesy light ( Figure 133, Items 1, 5, and 6).
Slide rear headliner trim panel into place between corner and side interior trim panels (not shown) and B-pillar trim panels ( Figure 133, Items 5 and 7).
Install seven push-in fasteners through the rear headliner trim panel and into the cab header as shown ( Figure 133, Items 5 and 7).
Install two push-in fasteners into each B-pillar trim panel ( Figure 133, Items 6 and 7).
Install two push-in fasteners into the back of rear headliner trim panel ( Figure 133, Items 5 and 6).
Install two push-in fasteners into the top of each corner and side interior trim panel ( Figure 132, Items 4 and 5).
Install coat hook and press in until it snaps in place ( Figure 132, Item 1).
Push coat hook lever up and press until it snaps in place ( Figure 132, Item 3).
Push coat hook lever cover up and press until it snaps in place ( Figure 132, Item 2).
